channel.title: echOasis
channel.description: Feeling desolate in the digital wasteland of unibz? You are not alone. Enjoy the company and listen to the voices of others at this pond. Get away from your computer; connect with your surroundings and yourself, instead. I’m Simon and together with my guests, we will explore happiness and stress on the online unibz campus. Allow yourself a break from the ever-present screens and listen to the people of unibz, such as students, teachers, administrative staff, researchers…

item.title: Martina Spinelli, President of k!kero
item.description:
In this episode, Martina Spinelli and I will explore the importance of culture for a healthy university community and discuss kikero’s attempts to offer a program despite virtual seperation. How might we connect outside of the online classroom? Which are the main difficulties for kikero? How can we all destress a bit together?
(00:00) Intro (03:19) Introducing Martina Spinelli, kikero and her role in it (09:50) Cultural offers at unibz (13:50) Communicating culture online (16:35) Martina personally (23:00) Online offers to destress (29:10) Outro and Meditation>
